segments.text: Come in , come in , what can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Professor Donald , are you giving your advanced geology course again next semester ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I am applying on it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I wonder if I could enroll in it . I know it is a graduate course and I ' m a junior , but ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Aren't you a bit young ? I have a lot of qualified seniors to take the course and they usually have a hard time keeping up .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know , but geology of the American west is my major interest and I have done a large reading in the field .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , if you think you are ready , I'll let you enroll .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , thanks , professor Donald . This is really very nice of you .
segments.speaker: S2
